sentences.en: All issues presented to the court are considered as fairly and expeditiously as possible.
sentences.cn: 向法庭提交的所有问题都得到了尽可能公正和迅速有效的审议。

sentences.en: Army units must work hard and expeditiously.
sentences.cn: 要雷厉风行,艰苦奋斗,紧张快干.

sentences.en: Interestingly enough , this should encourage the VC to work expeditiously on getting the transaction done.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是, 这将鼓励风投迅速敲定交易.

sentences.en: We will expeditiously facilitate trade transactions with the utmost professionalism.
sentences.cn: 我们会尽快贸易便利化的交易与最大的专业水平.

sentences.en: With the address printed out, the responding crews can attend to the reported address more expeditiously.
sentences.cn: 奉召出动的队员接获印出的地址后,便能迅速地到达现场.

trans.tran_en: in a quick and effective way
